name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce and logistics platforms at scale.

Outside work, I build tools that scratch my own itch. Started with Vue.js components (vue-loading-spinner, 688⭐), then Obsidian plugins (obsidian-open-gate, 223⭐), now building MCP servers to make AI assistants more useful (jira-mcp, 80⭐). Most projects begin as weekend experiments.
I write at 12bit.vn about technical decisions and onepercent.plus about continuous improvement. Co-founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016 when the framework was still new.
Side project aiocean.io is where I prototype AI tooling ideas - currently focused on Claude plugins and developer workflows.
After 13 years, still learning Go and TypeScript daily. The best code is the one you delete.
Based in Vietnam, working with distributed teams globally.

projects.title: Vue Loading Spinner
projects.description: Collection of loading spinners for Vue.js

now: Working on CodeWiki fork with Go support
